summary: A marketing executive tries to find Mr. Right on a Christian dating website. When impressing her dream guy ends in disaster, Gwyneth gets in touch with her spiritual side.
cast: Lacey Chabert|Jonathan Patrick Moore|Saidah Arrika Ekulona|Stephen Tobolowsky|John O'Hurley|Morgan Fairchild|David Keith|Corbin Bernsen|Jill Saunders|Sascha Alexander|Justin Dray|Tony D. Czech|Jessa French|Jelynn Sophia|Anna Anderson|Erin Bethea|Heaven Torres|Herson Chavez|Joshua Feinman|James Greilick|Jordan Andrusky|Gordon R. Barbosa|Seth Bewley|Taber Cross|Benjamin Hardy|Jason A. Jackson|Rich Young Lee|Michael J. Malstrom|Mark Mammone|Paige Morgan|Nikki|Quille|Cynthia Ramos|Rob Smat|Billy Teague|Dave Weltner|Jeremy Winter
title: Christian Mingle
